body.name: L.O.L. Surprise! Bubble Surprise Dolls - Collectible Doll, Surprises, Accessories, Bubble Surprise Unboxing, Glitter Foam Reaction - Great Gift for Girls Age 4+
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 21 hrs 26 mins
features: BUBBLES BUBBLES EVERYWHERE: Introducing L.O.L. Surprise Bubble Surprise! These tots are ready to swim in a sea of glittery bubbles that YOU create!

3 STEPS TO BUBBLE PARTY: Pour the broken heart pieces and water into the top of your L.O.L. Surprise ball, twist the top of the ball, then watch as the glittery bubble reaction changes color and reveals your own collectible doll and surprises!
SPARKLY, SHIMMERING DETAILS: Each doll has a unique style with shimmering, sparkly details and accessories
WATER SURPRISE: Feed or bathe your Bubble Surprise doll for a water surprise! Will your tot cry, spit, tinkle, or color change in cold water?
o WARM WATER: Use warm water (98˚F) for best results!
COLLECT THEM ALL: Collect all 12 L.O.L. Surprise Bubble Surprise dolls for the ultimate glittery bubble party!
body.description: Introducing L.O.L. Surprise Bubble Surprise! These tots are ready to swim in a sea of glittery bubbles that YOU create! Pour the broken heart pieces and water into the top of your L.O.L. Surprise ball, twist, then watch as the glittery bubble reaction changes color and reveals your own collectible doll and surprises! These tots have a blast playing both in and out of their sparkly bubbles. Find all the different ball and bubble colors, including the rare rose gold ball with matching glitter! Feed or bathe your Bubble Surprise doll for a water surprise! Will your tot cry, spit, tinkle, or color change in cold water? Collect all 12 L.O.L. Surprise Bubble Surprise dolls for the ultimate glittery bubble party! Complete your Bubble Surprise family with L.O.L. Surprise! Bubble Surprise Pets, Lil Sisters, and Deluxe! LOL Surprise collectible dolls with stylish hair, fun to dress outfits and many detailed accessory pieces make a perfect toy and playset for kids including 4- to 7-year-olds and up girls and boys for imaginative pretend play! As birthday gifts and gift for any special occasion, dolls provide hours of social play with siblings and friends! From MGA Entertainment, creators of LOL Surprise fashion and collectible dolls, Rainbow High fashion dolls, Na Na Na Surprise dolls, Bratz fashion dolls, MGA's Dream Ella fashion dolls, MGA's Glitter Babyz baby dolls, Lalaloopsy, Poopsie Surprise girls dolls, Baby Born Surprise Baby Dolls and Collectibles, Little Tikes kids toys and many other favorite brands.

reviews.reviewText: For the price this is a good deal, they are adorable and sturdy so she can play normally without damaging the doll, they are a good size and the toys that come with it are so cute!

reviews.reviewText: These are super cute dolls but the bubble thing wasn’t that exciting and wasn’t worth the mess. I’ll stick with the regular ones in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The directions that came with the doll didn’t explain properly. Now looking at the full description on Amazon, it makes more sense. But now all the bubble stuff is gone and didn’t work well. The doll is cute.

Super cute toy just a little messy and tricky to use1.gotta remove the 2 half hearts2.then you gotta dump both heart pieces into the top where the heart was3. Then add warm water to the top fill it up4. You gotta twirl it around for a few seconds until all mixed5. Then you twist it in the middle until the water drains into the ball6. Wait one min and twist again and the doll will be in the bottom
This product is like all the other LOL's.
Horrible product. Time consuming and messy.
